Headline: Loop bound Purple line Express Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop bound Purple line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Thorndale. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop bound Purple line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Thorndale.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #21 buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak. 

Allow extra travel time.
